assignments.description: Adds selected system into Id collection for use with LeadConvertDetail/CSLeadsConverter
assignments.name: Add_Selected_System_Id_to_List
assignments.label: Add Selected System Id to List

assignments.name: Set_Variables_For_Selection_Screen
assignments.label: Set Variables For SSS Selection Screen

collectionProcessors.description: If the lead is qualified for the Partner Selected SSS (indicated in SSS_Selected_by_Partner__c on Lead), the resulting array from this element should not be null. If not null, this prevents a user of this flow from being able to manually select SSSes to apply this lead to in a subsequent screen.
collectionProcessors.name: Partner_SSS_Available
collectionProcessors.label: Determine if Partner Selected System Available

decisions.description: If Lead is already converted, no need to try again
decisions.name: IsConverted
decisions.label: Is Lead Converted?

fields.name: txtAppIncomplete
fields.fieldText:
APPLICATION INCOMPLETE


The Lead has been identified as potentially incomplete as a result of the Application Complete Date field missing a value.


Please ensure that the Lead has been fully completed as would be indicated by the Application Complete Date field being set. If you believe this is in error, please contact BizApps for assistance.

fields.name: txtInvalidEmail
fields.fieldText:
INVALID EMAIL


The latest email communication to the customer on this Lead is reported to have bounced. The email address for the customer appears invalid.


Please ensure that we have an updated, working email on file for the customer on this Lead.

fields.name: previewHeaderText_0
fields.fieldText: CONFIRM PARTNER SELECTED SYSTEM

fields.name: qualificationPreviewHelptext_0
fields.fieldText:
The Partner indicated they would like this deal to be placed on a specific project. The first row of the table below represents the Partner's selection. This system will be prioritized during conversion. Please confirm the Partner's selection.


NOTE: All projects available for conversion are selected by default. This is to ensure that large customers can be subscribed to multiple Systems if needed. It is recommended, but not required, for all rows in the table below to be selected.

fields.name: previewHeaderText
fields.fieldText: QUALIFICATION PREVIEW

fields.name: qualificationPreviewHelptext
fields.fieldText: Consult the table below to preview qualifying systems for this Lead.

fields.name: previewError
fields.fieldText: NOTE: No qualifying systems were found. If you proceed, the Lead will be marked 'Unqualified' and the customer will receive an email indicating that their application has been denied.﻿

fields.name: txtResolveUALs_0_0
fields.fieldText:
INCOMPLETE UTILITY ACCOUNT LOGS


The Utility Account Logs for this lead are not ready for conversion.


A lead needs to have at least one Utility Account Log (UAL) with a QC Status of 'Complete' in order to proceed with conversion.


Please also confirm that 'Complete' UALs for this Lead meet the following criteria:


- Annual Usage is populated

- Rate Class is populated

fields.name: txtAlreadyConverted
fields.fieldText: LEAD ALREADY CONVERTED

fields.name: leadAlreadyConvertedHelptext
fields.fieldText:
This lead has already been converted. No further action necessary.


You may close this window now.

fields.name: txtError_0
fields.fieldText:
ERROR ENCOUNTERED


Lead Conversion ran into this error:

{!Run_Lead_Conversion.errorMessage}


The flow logged an error for BizApps to review. You may close this window or go back to re-attempt your request.

fields.name: txtError_0_0
fields.fieldText:
ERROR ENCOUNTERED


An unhandled error was encountered during Qualification and Conversion of the lead.


You may close this window or go back to re-attempt your request.

fields.name: txttest_0
fields.fieldText:
SUCCESS


The Lead has been successfully converted!


You may now close this window.

fields.name: txtNoDemandCapacity
fields.fieldText:
NO DEMAND CAPACITY AVAILABLE


One or more Utility Account Logs for this Lead has an Average Demand high enough to indicate a Demand subscription with the Utility, and none of the selected Systems have any available Demand Capacity.


Please go back and make changes to the selections of Systems, and/or check Exclude From Demand Capacity on the affected UALs if permitted. Also, verify that the selected Systems have Reserved Demand Capacity set.

fields.name: txtProductNoMatch_0_0
fields.fieldText:
PRODUCT MISMATCH


The Shared Solar Systems you selected do not all have the same Product, or one or more Systems do not match the Product on the Lead.


Please go back and make changes to the selections of Systems and/or Products for this Lead, or close this window.

fields.name: selectSystemsHeader
fields.fieldText: SELECT SHARED SOLAR SYSTEMS

fields.name: txtDatable
fields.fieldText:
Select the Shared Solar Systems that you want to be considered for subscriptions. Subscriptions will be created and sized based on the customer's annual usage, available capacity, and project maximums.


NOTE: This does not guarantee subscriptions will be created for all projects. If the project is not selected, no subscriptions will be created for the project.

fields.name: leadStatus
fields.fieldText:
LEAD IS UNQUALIFIED

﻿

  • Consult the table below to determine why there are no Projects available for this customer.
  • NOTE: An email has been sent to the customer indicating 'Sorry, we were unable to approve your application'

fields.name: leadStatusInvalid
fields.fieldText:
LEAD STATUS INVALID


Lead Status = {!Lead_After_Qualification.Status}


The Status of the Lead is invalid for the continuation of this process. Please contact BizApps for assistance.

fields.name: txtTestLead
fields.fieldText:
TEST LEAD


The Lead has been identified as a Test Lead used for testing purposes only. Conversion of this lead is not permitted under these circumstances.


Please ensure that the last name on the Lead is not 'Testcase', which indicates a Test Lead scenario.

fields.name: currentLeadInfoDisplay
fields.fieldText: CURRENT LEAD INFO

fields.name: currentLeadInfo
fields.fieldText:
Utility: {!getLead.Utility_relationship__r.Name}


Load Zone: {!getLead.LoadZone__c}


Product: {!getLead.Product__r.Name}

fields.name: txtMoodyScore
fields.fieldText: Moody's Rick Calc: {!getLead.Moody_s_Risk_Calc__c}

fields.name: selectedFieldCollection
fields.fieldText: Update the fields below if required.

fields.name: updateMoodys
fields.fieldText: Moody's Rick Calc:

fields.name: txtSplitLoadZone
fields.fieldText: Please resolve Split Load Zone before proceeding.

fields.name: updateLoadZone
fields.fieldText: Load Zone:

variables.description: Error code provided by CSLeadsConverter, if any, during lead conversion, which instructs flow how to process the results of the transaction
variables.name: apexConversionErrorCode
